materials.name: 2D lanthanide MOFs (Ln-TCPP, Ln = Ce, Sm, Eu, Tb, Yb, TCPP = tetrakis(4-carboxyphenyl) porphyrin)

synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Thickness of the nanosheets was controlled by varying the acetic acid concentration.
Only the Tb-TCPP crystal with large size and high quality was successfully synthesized.
